branchCategory.name: SS0750 Plug-in Manifold Stacking Base S Kit for EX260 Integrated Type (for Output)
branchCategory.description: <p>SS0750 Plug-in manifold with EX260 serial transmission system.  EX260 series is a compact and cost efficient interface to connect valve manifolds to ethernet and fieldbus network.  Available protocol include EtherNet/IP<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">™, EtherCAT</span><span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">®, PROFINET</span><span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">®, DeviceNet</span><span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">™, PROFIBUS-DP</span><span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">®, and CC-Link.</span></p>

breadCrumb.name: Plug-in Stacking Base S Kit for EX260
